title: Can we go to a Dentist of the opposite gender & what if there is no other alternative? assimalhakeem
transcript: we have yusuf from the netherlands can we have a dentist of the opposite opposite gender if and what is for there is no others yusuf from holland he says can we go to a dentist from the opposite gender the answer is no generally speaking but if it is paid by the government and i don't have means to [Music] pay privately and the only doctor the only dentist i can find is from the office agenda in this case insha allah it's permissible for necessity
